source_file: Virk et al. - 2023 - RIDDLE ME THIS A RARE CASE OF DIFFUSE PULMONARY MENINGIOTHELIOMAS.pdf

evidence.exact_quote: In our case, the patient was diagnosed with DPM
diagnosed with diffuse pulmonary nodules incidentally via CT angiogram chest during inpatient admission for COVID-19 infection

evidence.extracted_value: Bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryo biopsy
evidence.exact_quote: underwent bronchoscopy with bronchioalveolar lavage (BAL) with transbronchial cryo biopsy of lung nodules

evidence.extracted_value: Numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance
evidence.exact_quote: CT scan chest 1 year later showed numerous sub 6 mm bilateral centrilobular GGNs and solid pulmonary nodules with mild upper lobe predominance
transbronchial cryo biopsy of lung nodules, which showed MPMNs
decision was made for close follow-up with serial CT scans
given the complexity of the case, lack of symptoms, and stability of nodules

evidence.extracted_value: Ductal hyperplasia of the breast, common variable immunodeficiency syndrome (CVID), asthma, obstructive sleep apnea, and thyroid follicular cancer
evidence.exact_quote: history of ductal hyperplasia of the breast, common variable immunode /uniFB01 ciency syndrome (CVID), asthma, obstructive sleep apnea, and thyroid follicular cancer
